casebody.data:
Kovach et al., Appellants, v. Cincinnati Insurance Company, Appellee.

[Cite as Kovach v. Cincinnati Ins. Co. (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 153.]

(No. 98-1029 Submitted July 15, 1998 Decided September 23, 1998.) *154Hadden Co., L.P.A., and E. Bruce Hadden; Mark Kitrick Co., L.P.A., and Mark Kitrick, for appellants. Berlon & Timmel and J. Richard Brown, for appellee.

The discretionary appeal is allowed. The judgment is reversed, and the cause is remanded to the trial court for further proceedings on the authority of Ross v. Farmers Ins. Group of Cos. (1998), 82 Ohio St.3d 281, 695 N.E.2d 732.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
